code: import React from'react';import{FiZap}from'react-icons/fi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const formatTime=seconds=>{const mins=Math.floor(seconds/60);const secs=seconds%60;return"".concat(mins,":").concat(secs.toString().padStart(2,'0'));};const getFocusColor=score=>{if(score>=80)return'text-green-600';if(score>=60)return'text-yellow-600';return'text-red-600';};export const FocusTimer=_ref=>{let{totalTime,activeTime,focusScore,isActive}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed bottom-6 right-6 bg-white rounded-lg shadow-lg p-3 border ".concat(isActive?'border-green-200':'border-gray-200'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"flex items-center gap-2",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"w-8 h-8 rounded-full flex items-center justify-center ".concat(isActive?'bg-green-100':'bg-gray-100'),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FiZap,{className:"text-sm ".concat(isActive?'text-green-600':'text-gray-400')})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-xs",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-gray-600",children:formatTime(activeTime)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"font-bold ".concat(getFocusColor(focusScore)),children:[focusScore,"%"]})]})]})});};
